doc.abstracts: This Annual Report records the achievements of the Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency during fiscal year 2005. MIGA's investment insurance, dispute mediation services, and technical assistance generated strong results this fiscal year. The agency issued 62 guarantees totaling $1.2 billion for 33 new projects. Besides fiscal highlights, this report presents covers Board activities and MIGA's development impact in frontier markets, spotlighting achievements in Bosnia, Mozambique, and Afghanistan.
